body_html:
Same problem with macOS High Sierra, python 2.7.10 and pip 9.0.1.

The problem seems to be in setup.py (serving/tensorflow_serving/tools/pip_package/setup.py). As an intermediate solution I deleted the python_version checks in REQUIRED_PACKAGES. After everything works.
body_text:
Same problem with macOS High Sierra, python 2.7.10 and pip 9.0.1.
The problem seems to be in setup.py (serving/tensorflow_serving/tools/pip_package/setup.py). As an intermediate solution I deleted the python_version checks in REQUIRED_PACKAGES. After everything works.
body:
Same problem with macOS High Sierra, python 2.7.10 and pip 9.0.1.

The problem seems to be in ```setup.py``` (```serving/tensorflow_serving/tools/pip_package/setup.py```). As an intermediate solution I deleted the ```python_version``` checks in ```REQUIRED_PACKAGES```. After everything works.
